instruction: Identify the locations mentioned in the lyrics of the song "Hotel California".
output: The song "Hotel California" mentions several locations. These include Los Angeles, California; the desert; the 'Mexican' border; an 'elegant' hotel by the 'desert shore; and a 'beautiful' coastal city. Other locations mentioned in the song include the 'valley' or 'valleys' and the 'trees' which are mentioned in the chorus.
